text: @NikkiHaley On Monday Vice President Mike Pence made clear to state state Governors in a conference call the Covid-19 situation in America has become grave and to protect citizens however they can. I have a question. Why in the heck are @POTUS and @BetsyDeVosED pushing to reopen schools?
